document.full_text: the u.s. nuclear industry and regulators need to reexamine disaster planning and worst-case scenarios, especially in reactors such as the vermont yankee with the same design as the crippled plant at the center of the japanese crisis, a top expert says.
document.title: nuclear expert: u.s. should review worst case scenarios
lines_and_colors: the u.s. nuclear industry and regulators need to reexamine disaster planning and worst-case scenarios, especially in reactors such as the vermont yankee with the same design as the crippled plant at the center of the japanese crisis, a top expert says.
